name: Math Match
description:
This is my first game project to see if I could develop a simple mobile game. I had no prior game making or 3D modelling experience, so this was a great exercise. I learned how to use Unity engine as well as some basic shading scripting and object modelling with Blender.  

Game idea: You play a simple character, who has to run on endless bridge and on the way you have to solve various math problems in order to not fall down.

  • Easy to understand
  • Suitable for children
  • Relaxing

P.S. Rate button (star icon) doesn't do anything, because it's supposed to let player rate the game on Google Play store, but I haven't published it there so it's like a decoration :)
